## very_smooth

先用这个脚本poorf验证 : 
```python
from hashlib import sha256
import string
def proof():
    s1 = b'JXXCe9pJLSpr'
	sha1 = b'510f0df96af2ec7a9ed321ef2158312095041920699402c73c8e3014d8e73c38'
    tab = string.printable
    for a in tab:
        for b in tab:
            for c in tab:
                for d in tab:
                    s = a+b+c+d+s1
                    if sha256(s.encode('utf-8')).hexdigest() == sha1:
                        print("find:", s)
proof()
```

题目给了一个密钥文件,解密得到

![image-20210604155214649](C:\Users\16953\Pictures\Saved Pictures\image-20210604155214649.png)

但n是fake n 我们需要先恢复 n

![image-20210604155319117](C:\Users\16953\Pictures\Saved Pictures\image-20210604155319117.png)




```python
n = 
```

用 primefac 参数 为p-1得到p和q得值

解密的到flag

用以下命令 : 

```python
python -m primefac -vs -m=p+1 [参数n]
```

得到pq参数

```shell
Z1241  =  P620 x P621  =   x 
```

解密得到flag

flag{984af69b-5497-471b-9fa3-cda517490ad2}
